name: Beloved Beatrice
description:
[Short game made for class in RPG Maker MV]

Beatrice has never liked the world she lived in, so she escapes into the realm of dreams in order to avoid it. What happens after she encounters a mysterious girl within her dream?

Basic Controls:

[Keyboard]

Directional arrows to move.

Z/Enter key: progress dialogue, examine stuff, pick options

X: back/cancel/ access menu

Hold shift to run

[Mouse]

Left click: Move anywhere on map, progress dialogue, examine stuff.

Right click: back/cancel/access menu

[Possible trigger warnings, may contain vague spoilers]

There's some slight insinuations at abuse, self-harm, and death.
